Timeserie¶

Contents

  • Timeserie Class

Timeserie Class¶

Timeserie object. A timeserie is stored as a numpy 1D array. The class implement shuffle_timeserie(index_low, index_high) that allows to shuffle the timeserie between index_low and index_high

class GTgen.timeserie.Timeserie(serie=array([], dtype=float64), out_path='./timeserie.txt')[source]¶

Bases: object

the timeserie
